testcase.name: Debug Write Test should execute uart test and verify memory writes

failure.message: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: requirement failed: /home/johnson/Desktop/mycpu-4soc/4-soc/verilog/uart.asmbin.txt is not a relative path
